Question
========
  
In a sample of Dutch workers with burnout, stress level is measured by the number of nanograms of cortisol per milliliter in saliva. What is the measurement level of the measured variable? 
Answerlist
----------
* Dichotomous.
* Ordinal.
* Quantitative.
* Discrete.

Solution
========

Answerlist
----------
* Incorrect
* Incorrect
* Correct
* Incorrect
